title: Launching The game is not working :(

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So basically i logged on today and my launcher starts as normal, i click launch the thing launches but it stays black. I dont know why this is happening i've tried reinstalling. At the top left it says "League of legends 6.18.16_09_01_19_25"...

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot!  It looks like your network might be having problems establishing a connection, so it results in a black screen because you can't download assets.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshot this and get things fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
